measured_by: Finnish Investigative Instrument of Child Sexual Abuse (FICSA)
justification: "The Finnish Investigative Instrument of Child Sexual Abuse (FICSA) ... is a decision-making support tool that uses Bayesian statistics to estimate the probability of a child being victim of child sexual abuse (CSA)."

topic_or_construct: Child’s risk and protective factors related to CSA
measured_by: Written background questionnaire used as FICSA input
justification: "The information needed as input for FICSA can be gathered through a background questionnaire that the child answers in written form."

topic_or_construct: Forensic experts’/students’ assessment of CSA likelihood
justification: "Participants were asked to estimate the probability that each of the two described children had been victim of CSA... ‘What is for you the probability of the CSA? (0–100 %)’."
